Dgame.Math.Vertex



struct Vertex;
A Vertex has coordinates, a color and texture coordinates

Author:
rschuett

The coordinates

float y;
The coordinates

float z;
The coordinates

float r;
The color components

float g;
The color components

float b;
The color components

float a;
The color components

float tx;
The texcoords

float ty;
The texcoords

this();
Disable default CTor

this(float x, float y, float z, float tx, float ty);
CTor

this(ref const Vector2f position, ref const Vector2f texcoord);
CTor

CTor

pure nothrow void set(ref const Vector2f position, ref const Color col, ref const Vector2f texcoord);
Set a (new) position, a (new) color and (new) texcoords.

pure nothrow void setPosition(ref const Vector2f position);
Set a (new) position

pure nothrow void setPosition(float px, float py, float pz = 0.000000F);
Set a (new) position

pure nothrow void setColor(ref const Color col);
Set a (new) color

pure nothrow void setTexCoord(ref const Vector2f texcoord);

pure nothrow void setTexCoord(float tx, float ty);
Set (new) texcoords

const Color getAsColor();
Create a Color from the color data

const pure nothrow Vector2f getPositionAsVector();
Create a Vector2f from the position data (the z coordinate is ignored).

const pure nothrow Vector2f getTexCoordAsVector();
Create a Vector2f from the position data (the z coordinate is ignored).
